body:
Can we test all possible combinations, i.e., `torch.randint(high, size)`, `torch.randint(low, high, size)` and the out variants? The above `test_rand` and `test_randn` are not the best examples... Sorry about those. 

Additionally, can you also check that the sampled values are within bounds?
